actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to postpone the effective date of certain requirements imposed on States by Public Law 93-647 with respect to child support programs in the case of States which require additional time in which to implement the policies, programs, and activities so required.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to postpone, upon request from the Governor, the effective date of requirements imposed on States with respect to child support programs in the case of States which require additional time in which to implement the policies, programs, and activities so required.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to postpone the effective date of certain requirements imposed on States by Public Law 93-647 with respect to child support programs in the case of States which require additional time in which to implement the policies, programs, and activities so required.
